name: Loot Burger King
description:
I hope you enjoy my topical hentai game about these times. Thank you for playing as per usual. If you get angry, just eat a spoon of salt why don't you. Please give me a 5/5 rating and please buy these really cool hentai games. Please donate to Emergency Release Fund to bail out The REAL Hamburglar and all his friends (though The Hamburglar is white, he is still a cool guy who believes in BLM and attends the protests Peacefully, this game doesn't depict the real burglar...).

Songs are remixes of One Way by Young Kartz.
